about_the_game: "Embark on an interstellar journey with 'Space Detective: The Case of the Rebel Robot,' where the captivating soundtrack transcends dimensions. Immerse yourself in a cosmic soundscape influenced by the pulsating beats of synthwave and the serene melodies of citypop. This carefully crafted fusion of genres creates a spacey, yet relaxing ambiance that enhances every moment of your detective adventure. Let the music guide you through the enigmatic depths of the universe, adding an extra layer of enjoyment to your quest for justice. Explore the unknown with a soundtrack that's as dynamic and diverse as the mysteries that await!"
